title: An old video is being falsely shared as ‘Muslims rally in support of CAA in Kerala’
subtitle: Video shared as that of Muslims rally in support of CAA in Kerala is an old video. The same video is in circulation on the internet since May-2019.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video is being widely shared on Facebook with a claim that it shows a rally by Muslims in support of the Citizenship (Amendment) Act, 2019 in Kerala. Let’s try to analyze the claim made in the post. 



Claim: Video of Muslims rally in support of CAA in Kerala. Fact: The posted video is an old one. The same video is in circulation on the internet since May-2019. Hence the claim made in the post is FALSE.

When the screenshots of the video were run through the Google Reverse Image Search, a lot of similar videos were found in the search results. It can be seen that one of those videos was uploaded on YouTube in May-2019. The video had the following title: ‘Muslims Celebrate on PM Narendra Modi Victory from Varanasi in 2019 Loksabha Polls’. While it cannot be ascertained whether the video is related to Varanasi, with the available information, it is definitely not related to any recent rallies related to CAA and NRC.

To sum it up, an old video is being falsely shared as ‘Muslims rally in support of CAA in Kerala’.

Did you watch our new Episode of the DECODE series?
